articles.author: Jenni Reid
articles.title: European Central Bank set to deliver final rate cut of the year - CNBC
articles.description: It appears unlikely that a 0.5 percentage-point rate cut could be in store, despite headline inflation having settled near the ECB's 2% target.
articles.content:
The European Central Bank will debate whether to cut by 25 or 50 basis points on Thursday, but will ultimately settle on the smaller move, several economists told CNBC.
A key point of discussion is … [+1617 chars]

articles.author: Tom Nicholson
articles.title: France tells Israel to halt Golan Heights incursion - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Paris calls military deployment in buffer zone “a violation of the 1974 disengagement agreement” between Damascus and Tel Aviv.
articles.content:
The United Nations has also criticized Israel for violating the 1974 agreement.
On Sunday, as Damascus fell to rebel groups and Syrian dictator President Bashar Assad fled to Moscow, Israeli Prime M… [+1313 chars]
